name: Snake vs Bomb 2
overview: Your task is to guide your snake safely along a road across a Canyon. You can only move the snake up or down. While travelling along the long straight road, admiring the scenery. During your very long journey, you will encounter scrumptious fruit that has been dropped on the road. However, there is also bad news. Bombs are also dropped on the road. At the top of the screen, you will see a green snake. Each part of the snake in the status panel will turn from green to gold. This indicates how far you have travelled. After the tongue of the snake is yellow and you travel a little further distance. You will move onto the next level, where more fruit and bombs will appear on the road, giving your snake less space to dodge those deadly bombs. Can your snake reach safely to the other side of the canyon, or there be an explosive end for your snake? There's only one way to find out ... Play the game!
